snippet: The chief executive of Pearson North America defends his company’s role in education reform.
abstract: Letter from Pearson North America chief executive Will Ethridge responds to April 28 Gail Collins column criticizing Pearson's role in crafting standardized tests in New York State as the privatization of public education. (S)
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: Re ''A Very Pricey Pineapple,'' by Gail Collins (column, April 28):
